title: Pirelli Scorpion XC RC 2.4″ adds wider option to their lightest, fastest, race-ready MTB tire
content:
Pirelli keeps filling out their more refined and ever-growing mountain bike tire line-up, now adding a wider 2.4″ version of the Scorpion XC RC cross-country race tire. It’s a subtle update for their fastest-rolling MTB tire. But with larger volume and both extra-light or reinforced casing options, it’ll go a long way towards expanding the […]
